sponsors.name: Tony Holroyd
sponsors.about: Tony Holyroyd is an Atelier legend, providing sponsorship out of his own pocket, all to see the Leeds testing community thrive. Has no online presence, likes it that way.

sponsors.name: Leigh Rathbone
sponsors.about: Leigh is absolute powerhouse of the testing community. The legendary Liverpool Tester Gathering will live forever in the memory, his hosting at TestBash, talks at testing conferences and beyond. Skilled, enthusiastic and outgoing, a superb leader of quality in teams and organisations.

sponsors.name: Scott Kenyon
sponsors.about: I have been part of the testing community for many years focusing on communication and neurodiversity in testing. being diverse myself i bring a different perspective on my own testing I strongly believe in collaborative methods and using different thought techniques and people's perspectives to look at things from many angles.

sponsors.name: Ady Stokes
sponsors.about: I’m passionate about exploring and testing software as part of the creation and development of useful applications. I strongly believe in collaborative methods and using different thinking techniques to look at things from all angles.

sponsors.name: Ministry of Testing
sponsors.about: Ministry of Testing is a community of practice for software testing professionals. We believe the software testing, quality engineering, and quality assurance professions deserve a space, a community, a network, and the possibility to expand.

sponsors.name: The Coders Guild
sponsors.about: Promoting inclusion, diversity and equality through expert training, coaching and CPD opportunities for software development. A safe space offering community-driven, peer-reviewed and open-source knowledge share.

sponsors.name: Glean
sponsors.about: Glean is the antidote to information overload for improved student success.

sponsors.name: Nimble Approach
sponsors.about: Nimble are a tightly knit collective of elite product & technology professionals who love what we do! We’ve taken a people first, quality-driven approach to growing our community by handpicking only people who have the right values, characteristics, and ability.

sponsors.name: Burendo
sponsors.about: An award-winning consultancy delivering stand-out products and services through technology. We partner with organisations to accelerate value delivery and transform customer experiences.

sponsors.name: John Lewis Partnership
sponsors.about: Our Partnership is an ongoing experiment to find happier, more trusted ways of doing business, for the benefit of us all. We work together to create a successful business and a fairer, more sustainable future for Partners, customers, suppliers and communities.

sponsors.name: Doza
sponsors.about: We share a common vision of wanting to deliver innovative solutions that drive meaningful value for businesses. The foundation for Digital Transformation is people. However you choose to work with us, we're always here to bring you real value and foster a friendly and collaborative culture.

sponsors.name: WRK Digital
sponsors.about: WRK digital was founded to be a Trusted, Passionate and Authentic business, partnering some of the most exciting companies to scale their technology teams and disrupt our industry.

sponsors.name: Conflux
sponsors.about: Expert-led group learning for adopting fast flow and Team Topologies.

sponsors.name: Hippo Digital
sponsors.about: At Hippo, we design with empathy and build for impact. We do this by combining data-informed evidence, human-centred design and software engineering. We're a digital services partner who is genuinely invested in helping our clients thrive as modern organisations.
